content: today, the sun was shining bright. i felt grateful to be able to touch grass

visualPrompt.visualPrompt: A pair of hands gently caressing the lush, verdant blades of grass, sunlight filtering through the leaves above and casting a warm, golden glow on the scene
visualPrompt.colorPalette: Vibrant greens, soft golden light, touches of blue sky
visualPrompt.cinematicStyle: Slow, steady close-up, with a slight tilt up to reveal the dappled canopy of leaves overhead
